resources.string: DarkSpell won\'t work, untill you believe in DarkMagic!
Root access was not found or denied. DarkSpell needs root to set profiles.
Storage permission denied, Couldn\'t look for custom descriptions.
The DarkMagic kernel profile, known for its fluid performance and no drop in battery percentage during idling!
Not-so-interesting stock kernel profile with stock CPU frequencies..
Super-conservative profile that lets performance take a hit in order to achieve long-lasting battery life.
Need that extra 10 FPS? Need not worry, I gotchu!

Looks like you\'ve found the hidden EXKM Profile loader! While profile loading was originally planned to be a premium feature, I\'ve decided to include it as an easter egg. Others may be hidden in Spectrum, so happy hunting!
Are you sure you want to load this file?
